# [DreamBroker](https://dreambroker.com)

DreamBroker Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: DreamBroker
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: dreambroker.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
